name: SPACE DAMAGE🚀
description:
📝 DESCRIPTION:

SPACE DAMAGE is an exciting and challenging action platform game, the goal of which is to survive 15 "game" minutes on an alien ship and destroy as many enemies as possible.

🎮 CONTROLS:

MOVE:

W or ⇧  -  Turbo

A / D  or  ⇦ / ⇨  -  Rotation  /  Movement to the right to the left

SPACE   -  Shot  / Jump

⚙ OTHER:

Esc - Exit to main menu

Q - Pause

CREDITS:

🧠🛠 Programming / Art / Game design   -   Pavel Laptev
